item.title: Announcing PowerShell, DevOps, and Cloud Conference 2021
item.description: PowerShell Conference Asia 2019 was a huge success. The attendee turnout was never like before. We had 200+ attendees and speakers worldwide spend three days in Bangalore to share their PowerShell expertise.
